name: Perfect Push Up
how_to_perform:
* Place your hands shoulder-width apart, with your fingers facing forward.
* Engage your core and form a straight line from head to heels.
* Lower yourself down until your chest almost touches the ground. 
* Pause briefly at the bottom.
* Push back up to the starting position, extending your arms fully.
short_summary: Perfect push-ups are an upper body exercise that primarily works the chest, shoulders, and triceps, performed by lowering and raising the body in a plank position.
